How to (and how not to) design REST APIs · stickfigure/blog Wiki
item.description: How to (and how not to) design REST APIs Oct 30, 2023URLs are resource identifiers, not representations. Adding representation information to the URL means there's no canonical URL for a 'thing'. Clients may have trouble uniquely identifying 'things' by URL.
